default.value: Phase 1 architecture designed: Official SDK migration, Transport layer (stdio+HTTP), Tools protocol completion, Schema sanitization, Response transformation. See docs/architecture/MCP_INTEGRATION_ARCHITECTURE.md

Phase 2 architecture designed: Prompts primitive (prompts/list, prompts/get), Resources primitive (resources/list, resources/read, subscriptions), OAuth 2.0 with PKCE and dynamic discovery. See docs/architecture/MCP_INTEGRATION_ARCHITECTURE.md

Phase 3 architecture designed: Roots primitive with filesystem enforcement, Sampling primitive with human review, Enhanced trust management with audit logging. See docs/architecture/MCP_INTEGRATION_ARCHITECTURE.md

Phase 4 architecture designed: Elicitation primitive for interactive workflows, Comprehensive conformance testing, Debug inspector with message logging. See docs/architecture/MCP_INTEGRATION_ARCHITECTURE.md

New MCP file structure: src/mcp/{client,transport,protocol,config,auth,security,observability,debug}. Key files: mcp-client.ts, transport-factory.ts, tools-protocol.ts, prompts-protocol.ts, resources-protocol.ts, oauth-provider.ts, trust-manager.ts. Migration: AdapterCompatibilityLayer for backward compat.

ADR-001: Migrate to official @modelcontextprotocol/sdk for protocol compliance. ADR-002: Implement stdio+HTTP transports, skip deprecated SSE. ADR-003: Four-phase rollout prioritizing critical features. See docs/architecture/MCP_INTEGRATION_ARCHITECTURE.md for full details.

Complete MCP architecture design delivered: 4-phase plan (Critical→High→Medium→Advanced), 14-20 week timeline, 75%+ MCP coverage target. File structure: src/mcp/{client,transport,protocol,auth,security,observability}. Key: Official SDK migration, dual transport (stdio+HTTP), backward compat layer. See docs/architecture/ARCHITECTURE_SUMMARY.md and MCP_INTEGRATION_ARCHITECTURE.md

Complete visual architecture diagrams created: System context (C4), Container diagram, Component diagram, Sequence diagrams (tool execution, OAuth, resources), State machines (connection, OAuth, trust), Data flow diagrams, Migration path visualization. See docs/architecture/ARCHITECTURE_DIAGRAMS.md

gemini-flow.value: Phase 2 MCP implementation completed successfully. Files created: prompts (discovery, retrieval, registry), resources (discovery, reader, subscriptions), auth (oauth-provider, token-storage, utils), enhanced-client, and comprehensive documentation. All features working: prompts/list, prompts/get, resources/list, resources/read, resource subscriptions, OAuth 2.0 with PKCE, token management, and auto-discovery.
